snippet: Britain's Deputy Prime Minister wants Russia stripped of the right to host the 2018 World Cup to punish President Vladimir Putin for "belligerent behavior" in the Ukraine crisis....

headline.print_headline: UK Deputy PM Wants Russia Stripped of World Cup
headline.main: UK Deputy PM Wants Russia Stripped of World Cup

lead_paragraph: Britain's Deputy Prime Minister wants Russia stripped of the right to host the 2018 World Cup to punish President Vladimir Putin for "belligerent behavior" in the Ukraine crisis.
